Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18584916]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=58 µM), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC>116 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=46 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=231 µM), Escherichia coli ATCC 35218 (MIC>116 µM);Fungi:Aspergillus flavus (MIC=58 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Activity against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, and has strong hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Isolation, characterization and molecular cloning of new temporins from the skin of the North African ranid Pelophylax saharica.
Literature.Author: Abbassi F, Oury B, Blasco T, Sereno D, Bolbach G, Nicolas P, Hani K, Amiche M, Ladram A
